column2: The half-legendary Hanpu Wanyan might have been from Goryeo. No matter his origins, he began the work to consolidate the Jurchen tribes.
Since we claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven, it is only natural that we can subjugate large tracts of land in a single war.
Our old ways are holding us back. Converting to the Taoist religion would be useful.
Our old ways are holding us back. Converting to the Buddhist religion would be useful.
There are those that the heavens would look favorably on us ruling China. Claiming the Mandate of Heaven would be a good first step towards this goal.
A large number of Jurchen warriors will arrive to support your claim.
Follows a religion that's Chinese enough
Has a culture that's Chinese enough
A silver-tongued Jewish man has appeared at your court. His time spent abroad has gifted him with many connections, and by all accounts he is an able diplomat. He would make a fine chancellor.
This is how much Grace [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] currently has.
The Kingdom of Balhae was multi-cultural and multi-religious, but its rulers promoted the Buddhist religion.
The Shinto religion and the Buddhist religion have co-existed with one another for some time, and it would not be out of the question to convert from one to the other.
The Shinto religion and the Buddhist religion have co-existed with one another for some time, and it would not be out of the question to convert from one to the other.
The Shenist faith and the Taoist faith are both Chinese religions, and converting from one to the other would be an option.
While the Buddhist religion did not originate in China, converting from Shenist to Buddhist would be an option.
The Shenist religion is part of your cultural heritage, and it would be easy enough to convert to it from the Buddhist religion.
The Taoist faith and the Shenist faith are both Chinese religion, and converting from one to the other would be an option.
While the Taoist religion did not originate in Korea, converting from Muist to Taoist would be an option.
While the Buddhist religion did not originate in Korea, converting from Muist to Buddhist would be an option.
The Muist religion is part of your cultural heritage, and it would be easy enough to convert to it from the Buddhist religion.
The Muist religion is part of your cultural heritage, and it would be easy enough to convert to it from the Taoist religion.
While the Taoist religion did not originate in Vietnam, converting from Thanist to Taoist would be an option.
While the Buddhist religion did not originate in Vietnam, converting from Thanist to Buddhist would be an option.
The Thanist religion is part of your cultural heritage, and it would be easy enough to convert to it from the Buddhist religion.
The Thanist religion is part of your cultural heritage, and it would be easy enough to convert to it from the Taoist religion.
While not agreeing on everything, the Buddhist and Taoist religions are compatible enough that you easily could convert from one to the other.
While not agreeing on everything, the Buddhist and Taoist religions are compatible enough that you easily could convert from one to the other.

The merchants trading along the Silk Road often travel far from their home, bringing with them strange ideas and stranger religions. Sometimes, locals might convert to these religions, as in the case of the recent conversion of [Root.GetName] to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

The merchants trading along the Silk Road often travel far from their home, bringing with them strange ideas and stranger religions. Sometimes, locals might convert to these religions, as in the case of the recent conversion of [From.GetName] to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
Forming a Chinese Imperial empire with the special Jurchen decision also spawns a large number of event troops.
Forming a Chinese Imperial empire with the special Jurchen decision does not spawn a large number of event troops.
You possess the Chrysanthemum Throne, and thus you are the rightful ruler of the Empire of Japan. Any other empire is simply a means to that end.
The Horse Breeder makes sure that the warriors of the province rapidly can deploy for combat.
The Warrior Barracks is where warriors and raiders gather and train for deployment.
A silver tounged Jewish man has appeared at your court. His time spent abroad has gifted him with many connections, and by all accounts he is an able diplomat. He would make a fine chancellor.
Upon the death of the Khagan of the Mongol Empire, all Mongol chieftains would convene at the capital to elect the successor from among the relatives of the deceased Khagan.
Not for use against Fafnir! - Vlad (not a vampire!)
Maybe you should pull out a card or three. What is the worst thing that could happen?
It seems like you are trying to cast a spell. Would you like some help with that?
A guide to how to terrorize the countryside properly
This item can only be used by dragons
This book contains nothing you don't already know
You have never heard of the "Citadel of Certain Doom" before, and the other landmarks are equally unfamiliar.
Kidnapped from her family by the fearsome dragon Fredak, Emperor of Embers
Legends say that when trolls ran rampant in the forums of the Roman Empire the Moderatorii were there to fight them.
This item can only be used by moderators
+1 Ring to rule them all, +1 Ring to find them, +1 Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them
This strange red liquid can be used to heal injuries, cure diseases, or improve your health.
Created from a scale from the mighty Fredak, Emperor of Embers, this shield is impervious to normal weapons.
Kill them all! "No, help them all!" "Kill them!" "Help them!"
It seems Fredak, Emperor of Embers, had an impressive family tree.
This is a symbol of faith that is more impressive than most
There is just something about this ring that says "I am noteworthy!"
Your friends will betray you, but I will always have your back!
By consuming the glowing liquid inside, you can obtain eternal life.
Just scratch out "Fredak, Emperor of Embers" and put your own name on it.
This ring grants mastery of all matters pertaining to speechcraft.
Steel Band of the Warrior's Might
This ring grants mastery of all matters pertaining to war.
This ring grants mastery of all matters pertaining to wealth.
This ring grants mastery of all matters pertaining to secrecy.
This ring grants mastery of all matters pertaining to knowledge.
This weapon is particularly good against dragons.
This weapon is particularly good against trolls.
This can be used to heal you or to improve your health.
This can be used to gain eternal life.
This can be used to claim the Dragon Throne.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will forever be remembered as the [This.GetWomanMan] who put an end to the dreaded Fredak, Emperor of Embers.
There is no restriction on the uninvited supernatural guests at the Lunar New Year celebration if supernatural events are enabled.
Uninvited supernatural guests at the Lunar New Year celebration are from the Far East only.
